parameters.name: Comment
parameters.description: The dataset description. Length not exceeding 1024.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The dataset ID. Only DataWorks datasets are supported for update.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The dataset name. A non-empty string, length not exceeding 128.

parameters.name: Readme
parameters.description: The user guide, supports Markdown formatted rich text.
